Package controller

package controller
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AddAppointment
    Controller class for handling the adding of new appointments.
    AddCustomer
    Controller class for handling the adding of new customers.
    AppointmentMenu
    Controller class to display appointment information in a table view.
    CustomerMenu
    Controller class to display customer information in a table view.
    EditAppointment
    Controller class for handling the editing of existing appointments.
    EditCustomer
    Controller class for handling the updating of customers.
    Login
    Controller class for handling logging into the application.
    MainMenu
    Controller class for the main menu of the application.
    Report1Menu
    Controller class responsible for displaying Report 1.
    Report2Menu
    Controller class responsible for displaying Report 2.
    Report3Menu
    Controller class responsible for displaying Report 3.
    ReportsMenu
    Controller class for the reports menu of the application.
